channel.title: The server is being updated..?
channel.description: I was able to connect to my server fine a few minutes ago, but now for some reason when I try to connect, the client gives a "The server is being updated. Please wait 1 minute and try again." I can't seem to figure out why it's doing this.. Anybody help? It's set to local host, 0.0.0.0 and it was working fine earlier, so idk what happened..

item.title: The server is being updated..?
item.dc:creator: @shapesnatch shapesnatch
item.description:
@shapesnatch wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:2, topic:535872”]Might be a obvious question but have you use the update command (or someone else)? If so, turn off the CMD prompt and open it back up, should work fine.

If that’s not the problem, I tried. ;D[/quote]

I didn’t use any commands at all

Read full topic

item.title: The server is being updated..?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Might be a obvious question but have you use the update command (or someone else)? If so, turn off the CMD prompt and open it back up, should work fine.

If that’s not the problem, I tried. ;D

Read full topic
